reviewText: Although not as good as a runner as Steve Prefontaine, this movie is very exceptional. A must see for serious runners.

This is no Prefontaine movie.  Ryun didn't have the charisma nor cockiness of Prefontaine, but he was a much better runner.  There are not going to be any Hollywood movies written about him, so this will probably be your only  chance to see what a great runner he was on video.  This is a good movie  for those serious runners, more racing and less drama.
